div.h2: Discover Belgium’s Most Captivating Cities with a Local Guide
div.p: Embark on an unforgettable journey through four of Belgium’s most iconic cities — Brussels, Antwerp, Ghent, and Namur — each offering a unique blend of history, culture, and charm.

li.p: Brussels, the heart of Europe, welcomes you with grand architecture, cobblestone streets, and a vibrant atmosphere. From the opulent Grand Place to the surreal world of Magritte, this city is a must-see for culture lovers and history buffs alike.

Antwerp dazzles with its fashion-forward spirit and rich artistic heritage. Explore the legacy of Rubens, marvel at the gothic Cathedral of Our Lady, and stroll through the dynamic streets of this port city where tradition meets modern creativity.
Ghent enchants with medieval splendor and a youthful energy. Discover castles, canals, and hidden alleyways as you uncover the soul of a city where past and present coexist in perfect harmony.

Namur, nestled at the confluence of the Meuse and Sambre rivers, invites you to slow down and savor the beauty of Wallonia. Its imposing citadel, relaxed charm, and panoramic views make it a serene yet fascinating stop on your Belgian adventure.

div.p: Whether you're a first-time visitor or rediscovering Belgium, our guided tours offer insider stories, hidden gems, and unforgettable moments.

div.p: We are a team of passionate people whose goal is to improve everyone's life through disruptive products. We build great products to solve your business problems. Our products are designed for small to medium size companies willing to optimize their performance.

div.data-editor-sub-message: Following content will appear on all events.

section.t-cache: event if not editable and event.website_published else None

div.class: css_non_editable_mode_hidden o_not_editable bg-info-light border border-info border-bottom-0 rounded-top p-2

t.t-value: 'o_wevent_event_main_cover overflow-hidden ' + ('css_non_editable_mode_hidden border border-info rounded-bottom' if edition_cover_only else 'd-none' if opt_event_description_cover_hidden else 'rounded')

aside.t-if: opt_event_registration_block or opt_event_dates_block or opt_event_calendar_block or opt_event_location_block or opt_event_organizer_block or opt_event_share_block
aside.t-attf-class: col-lg-4 py-3 pb-lg-0 d-print-none {{'sticky-top align-self-start' if opt_event_fixed_sidebar else ''}}

div.p: Find out what people see and say about this event, and join the conversation.

h3.strong: Join Our Guided Group Tours — Discover More Together

div.p: Experience Belgium like never before with our expertly led group tours through Brussels, Antwerp, Ghent, and Namur. Whether you're traveling solo, with friends, or as part of a group, our guided tours offer the perfect balance of storytelling, sightseeing, and shared discovery.

Walk alongside fellow travelers as our passionate guides bring each city to life — from medieval alleyways and majestic cathedrals to modern neighborhoods full of local flavor. Our groups are small enough to stay personal, but big enough to share laughs and moments you'll remember long after the tour ends.

li.p: Friendly, knowledgeable guides who love questions
Carefully curated routes with iconic sights and hidden corners
A relaxed pace with time for photos, fun facts, and local tips
Great company — because exploring is better together
